sentences: Maria de Lourdes Martins (26 May 1926 â€“ 31 August 2009) was a Portuguese pianist and composer.
Maria de Lourdes Martins was born in Lisbon, Portugal, the daughter of Lisbon Conservatory teacher Maria Helena Martins.
She introduced the Orff-Schulwerk system from the Salzburg Mozarteum in Portugal, and won the Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation Composition Award two times.
